title: Yeast "Bamboo" - Converse Avant Poste
description:
French indie pop band Yeast recorded this live version of "Bamboo" at the legendary Cafe Charbon on Rue Oberkampf as part of our Converse Avant-Poste series. 

Converse Avant-Poste is a long-term celebration of emerging artists & musicians in the region - and will feature weekly gigs and regular films of the most exciting new talent from the city. Stay tuned to Converse YouTube for more coming soon.
